mapper.insert: insert into note (update_time, delete_time, title, content, status, notebook_id) values (#{updateTime}, #{deleteTime}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status}, #{notebookID})
mapper.select: select id, update_time, title, status, notebook_id from note where notebook_id = #{id} and status = 1
select id, update_time, delete_time, title, status, notebook_id from note where notebook_id in (select id from notebook where user_id = #{id}) and status = 0
mapper.update: update note set update_time = #{updateTime}, delete_time = #{deleteTime}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, status = #{status}, notebook_id = #{notebookID} where id = #{id}
